attributes.action: All members of government and the PM should have to take mandatory drug tests
attributes.additional_details: The government and parliament should be held to the same standards as they hold the men and women of the MOD and public services that have dedicated their lives to the country and should receive the same consequences for not upholding these standards.
attributes.background: All members of government, MPs and the PM should have to take random mandatory drug tests just like the MOD and public services and should be removed from their positions if they fail their test

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Introduce random alcohol & drug testing within the House of Commons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714495
